email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to transport 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Shanghai on CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and confirm vessel availability?

Best regards,
Laura Jensen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m, for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 45 per MT. Laycan is 2024-03-25 to 2024-03-30. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Choi

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider a lower rate? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Given the volume, I can offer a revised rate of USD 42 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

USD 42 per MT sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the OCEAN STAR with a laycan of 2024-03-25 to 2024-03-30? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Laura
